name: Heavy Load (itch)
description:
My submission to the Trijam #137, a short game made quick& dirty in less than 3 hours.

Use your heavy gun (which you almost can't lift) to save your friends from the asteroids which are for some reason falling down on earth.

A and D to lift the gun, SPACE or the mouse button to shoot.

You cannot win, just survive as long as you can... enjoy...

Credits:

  • Music: Wasteland Showdown by Matthew Pablo (https://opengameart.org/content/wasteland-showdown-battle-music)
  • Character Artwork: Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/toon-characters-1)
